entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain except snow inland early this morning. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 late this morning. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
